lead_paragraph: IMMERMAN--Robert M.,76, died peacefully at home in Larchmont, NY on January 21, 2016, having miraculously survived brain cancer for 20 years. Loving and beloved husband of Minna for 50 years, proud father to daughters Gaby and Suzanne and "Papa" to grandson Emmet. Architect, sketch artist, avid gardener and cook, devoted member of the Larchmont Temple community, he was much respected, admired and loved by legions of family and friends. Services will be held at Larchmont Temple on Monday, January 25 at 10am. Interment at Mt. Hope Cemetery, Hastings-on-Hudson, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  IMMERMAN, ROBERT M.
